NAME: Snigdha Sikdar
ABOUT:
A customer oriented, multitask professional with excellent analytical and logical skills .Highly qualified and well developed Business Analyst with extensive project lead experience that excels working with cross-functional teams and coordinating multiple projects simultaneously in various industries. Recognized as “quick learner” in delivering quality products. Expertise in prepare Integration Test Plan which was used by functional team as well as development team.
Solutions-oriented with notable success directing a broad range of IT initiatives such as system analysis, data mapping, development, reverse engineering, data warehousing, business intelligence, reporting, quality assurance testing, Systems Integrations testing and user-acceptance testing. Ability to work in team as well as individual and to produce the best result in pressure situations.
